description: This CSS file contains style definitions and theme management variables for a React application. It defines root CSS variables for both light and dark themes, styles for main components, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class that styles the main container of the application.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class that styles the application logo with animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Class for styling the application header section.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class used for styling links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for styling the theme toggle button.
